column4: སྔོན་མ་ སྔོན་མ་ བོུ་ གཞི་ ཡོད་རེད་ད་ ར །

column3: And then, she thought she would play outside the world.

column3: thought to go, then she was in the middle of the road. She pretended to fight  though no one was there.

column3: and then, she pretended to kick the ball though there was no ball.

column3: Then she planted flowers and at the same time she looked .

column3: Then, In the future she thought of becoming a drum player. So far she has stayed all alone.
